name: Drakheir The First Hand Tracking ARPG
summary: Got tired of simple and shallow hand-tracking tech demos?   Drakheir brings the actual action RPG gaming experience with cutting-edge hand-tracking technology.   Cast powerful elemental spells with your bare hands, combine them for epic fusion attacks, and master strategic combat with seals and dynamic movement. Unleash your magic and fight to save the Floating City!
